messages.title: Your vote can make a difference in Gordon
messages.content: The SNP has successfully weaponised the biggest working issue and widened the divide between Scotland and the rest of the United Kingdom. I am fighting this. I want to represent you in parliament to achieve a better deal. To achieve this I need your vote.

messages.title: Why we need to back Colin Clark in Gordon
messages.content: Only Colin Clark can beat the SNP here. Colin Clark's team have been working hard on the ground, holding street surgeries, meeting with local groups, and working with those for the good of Gordon.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I want to represent you in parliament to achieve a better deal for the economy.
The SNP has weaponised the biggest working issue and divided Scotland from the UK, which I oppose.
